scripts.prod:clean-install: pnpm run prod:clean-install:calendar-tests && pnpm run prod:clean-install:developer
scripts.pub:calendar: cd ./lib/calendar && pnpm run build && pnpm publish --access public
scripts.install-pnpm: pnpm run install-pnpm:calendar-tests && pnpm run install-pnpm:calendar && pnpm run install-pnpm:developer
scripts.reinstall-pnpm:calendar-tests: cd ./lib/calendar-tests && rm -rf node_modules && pnpm cache clean --force && pnpm install
scripts.reinstall-pnpm:calendar: cd ./lib/calendar && rm -rf node_modules && pnpm cache clean --force && pnpm install
scripts.reinstall-pnpm:developer: cd ./lib/developer && rm -rf node_modules && pnpm cache clean --force && pnpm install
scripts.reinstall-pnpm: pnpm run reinstall-pnpm:calendar-tests && pnpm run reinstall-pnpm:calendar && pnpm run reinstall-pnpm:developer
